name: The Showdown Effect: Reloaded
description:
Experience fast-paced over-the-top multiplayer action in The Showdown Effect: Reloaded. Join players from around the world to engage in high-octane battles filled with bullets, explosions, and one-liners!

Hone your skills fighting against unique characters!

Choose from a roster of 10 distinct characters, each with their own unique moves and playstyle! Victory hinges on your ability to leverage your character's strengths against your opponents' vulnerabilities. Master the intricacies of each combatant to dominate the showdown and emerge as the champion!

Battle across time and space!

From a medieval fortress in `Battle of the Bandits` to the bright neon lights of `Downtown Beatdown`, battle across 6 large maps from across time to see who the true champion of the world is!

Showcase your style with unique skins for your character and weapons!

Make your character your own with millions of possible skin combinations. Customize your character and weapons so you can be victorious in style!

Go solo or team up in a variety of game-modes!

Change up the experience with 4 different game-modes. Battle against the world in the free-for-all 'Showdown' mode; craft strategy and team up to defeat your opponents in 'Team Elimination'; take down the enemy henchman who have come to hunt you down in 'The Expendables'; and rise to top in 'One Man Army'. There is no shortage of ways to battle!

Make the game your own with customizable rulesets!

Create custom-servers with custom rules to play how you want. Increase the intensity with 'explosive throws' or stop worrying about having to reload with 'infinite reload'. With billions of combinations, the possibilities are endless to make the game your own!

Fight for glory and climb the leaderboard in ranked combat!

Climb the leaderboard in the ranked 'Showdown' and 'Team Elimination' game-modes, where you can earn elo over time. Only one can reign at the top!
